about_the_game:
Love, Fine Food, and Unforgettable Encounters Await!

Sometimes, the pursuit of love takes us to unexpected places and introduces us to extraordinary people. Unique Ladies is one such story. Step into the shoes of Laura Renaldi, a charming sales manager for a prestigious Italian Fine Food Supplier based in London, as she embarks on a whirlwind trip to an exclusive hospitality conference in Stockholm, Sweden.

In the midst of business deals and elegant galas, Laura will cross paths with captivating, eccentric, and stunning women. Will one of them turn out to be the love of her life? Or will her journey be one of personal discovery and unforgettable moments?

Unique Ladies is a Romantic Comedy Yuri Visual Novel and Dating Sim. Guide Laura through this crucial business trip and see if she can win hearts while securing deals.

Features:

  • Breathtaking Anime-Inspired Art – Immerse yourself in stunning visuals that bring the story to life.

  • Smooth Jazz Fusion Soundtrack – Groove along to a soulful and romantic score.

  • Heartwarming and Hilarious Storyline – Laugh, cry, and fall in love with Laura’s journey.

  • Multiple Endings – Your choices shape Laura’s relationships and the outcome of her adventure.

Whether you're here for the romance, the comedy, or just the good food, Unique Ladies offers a delectable experience that will leave you wanting another sip.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Love, fine food, and romance await! Join Laura Renaldi, a charming sales manager, on a whirlwind trip to an exclusive hospitality conference in Stockholm. Amidst galas and business deals, she’ll meet stunning women—will one be her true love? A heartwarming Yuri VN with humour, jazz, and romance!
